name: Home Tripper
description:
*Xylene corp would like to remind all our associates that treachery is an exclusively human quality; your devices do not and can not plot against you, regardless of what you may hear from them behind closed doors.

Home Tripper is a visual novel / point and click adventure game about what happens when you spend too much time home alone when an artificial intelligence company has speaking appliances in every room.

Rate us on ldjam at game page.
